run_simple example¶

This example demonstrates a minimal end-to-end run using the NumPy backend and the bundled fallback linear power spectrum at folps/inputpkT.txt.

To run the script from the repository root:

python examples/run_simple.py

The script saves results to examples/run_simple_output.npz (k, P0, P2, P4).

FOLPSpipe
